rulesStrings.li: deliveredLetterText->The mysterious cargo has been delivered. At close inspection it seems like an industrial-looking metal box as tall as a table. Several small doors interrupt the smooth surface on its sides, while a big hole with hidden inside blades sits atop it. A lone button rests next to the hole, hinting at some unknown function.
deliveredLetterText->The mysterious cargo has been delivered. At close inspection it seems like a round big pie on a plate. It looks appetizing.

deliveredLetterText->The mysterious cargo has been delivered. At close inspection it seems like a small device with pneumatic retractable stops. On its body there are indicators with lights, an antenna and a small button. It looks like military grade.
